snippet: Hearing loss in older adults increases the risk for hospitalization and poor health, a new study has found, even taking into account other risk factors.
abstract: Hearing loss in older adults increases the risk for hospitalization and poor health, a new study has found, even taking into account other risk factors.

headline.main: Hearing Loss Takes a Health Toll
headline.print_headline: Aging: Hearing Loss Takes Health Toll
